title: I love you Oceania! ♥
body:
Thanks so much for unlocking the Fizz icon; I've always dreamed of having Fizz as a summoner icon, and now my dreams will come true! ^_^

http://i.imgur.com/zYTGMMw.jpg

replies.body:
I completely pass on this event myself.

But I like the sound of someone's thank you. Praise me more plz.

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1CKWHMHyQyI/UgyNR8digyI/AAAAAAAAB0o/7lzlD0cptSY/s1600/tumblr_mqfteuLWLJ1ryy28to1_500.png

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8lBEA5XE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-25T05:26:40.243+0000)
>
> I completely pass on this event myself.
> 
> But I like the sound of someone's thank you. Praise me more plz.
> 
> http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1CKWHMHyQyI/UgyNR8digyI/AAAAAAAAB0o/7lzlD0cptSY/s1600/tumblr_mqfteuLWLJ1ryy28to1_500.png

http://i.imgur.com/otMkslM.jpg
no problem. I didn't contribute at all, but I'll take all the credit as the representative anyway.
dw, i got 3 points on here and 3 on kingdinger, to make up for people like you!
I tried to contribute but every time I played I lost.
How do you know it'll be a fizz icon, I thought it was just a placeholder.

> [{quoted}](name=Neofrost,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8lBEA5XE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-25T05:37:36.753+0000)
>
> How do you know it'll be a fizz icon, I thought it was just a placeholder.

Riot Maraudaur made a post here:

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=VgkpTJp8,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2015-01-25T01:24:43.744+0000)
>
> Fizz icon will be available to everyone on the OCE server for 1 IP if the goal is met.
> 
> It will also be available on other servers, but for a cost.

Maraudaur does state that It will be available on other servers as well, but oh well I'm just glad that I didn't take the risk because it would have been too much to bare.
Riot did state it is a Fizz icon.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8lBEA5XE,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-25T05:38:01.974+0000)
>
> Riot did state it is a Fizz icon.

Also it has been in PBE before Ocean Week started.

You're welcome.

Now you owe us...
